section: Aasaa - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

melody.description: There is no melody or mood associated with this line, which may be because it is the preamble to the hymn, or is not meant to be read in any particular melody or mood

author.author: None
author.description: There is no author associated with this line, as it may be the preamble to the hymn

text: ਹਰਿ ਹਰਿ ਹਰਿ ਹਰਿ ਹਰਿ ਹਰਿ ਹਰੇ ॥
section: Aasaa - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

translation.text: The Lord, Har, Har, Har, Har, Har, Har, Haray.

transliteration.text: har har har har har har harē .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. This Raag gives the listener the determination and ambition to put aside any excuses and to proceed with the necessary action to achieve the aim. It generates feelings of passion and zeal to succeed and the energy generated from these feelings enables the listener to find the strength from within to achieve success, even when the achievement seems difficult. The determined mood of this Raag ensures that failure is not an option and motivates the listener to be inspired.

author.author: Saint Ravidas
author.description: Saint Ravidas [1377 - 1528] was a Hindu shoemaker of the Chamar caste, who taught that a person is distinguished not by their caste, wealth or social status but instead by their actions.  Meerabai, the famous saint poetess is also said to have adopted Saint Ravidas as her Guru.

text: ਹਰਿ ਸਿਮਰਤ ਜਨ ਗਏ ਨਿਸਤਰਿ ਤਰੇ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
section: Aasaa - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

translation.text: Meditating on the Lord, the humble are carried across to salvation. ||1||Pause||

transliteration.text: har simarat jan gaē nisatar tarē .1. rahāu .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. This Raag gives the listener the determination and ambition to put aside any excuses and to proceed with the necessary action to achieve the aim. It generates feelings of passion and zeal to succeed and the energy generated from these feelings enables the listener to find the strength from within to achieve success, even when the achievement seems difficult. The determined mood of this Raag ensures that failure is not an option and motivates the listener to be inspired.

section: Aasaa - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

translation.text: Through the Lord's Name, Kabeer became famous and respected.

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. section: Aasaa - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

translation.text: The accounts of his past incarnations were torn up. ||1||

section: Aasaa - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

translation.text: Because of Naam Dayv's devotion, the Lord drank the milk he offered.

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. text: ਤਉ ਜਗ ਜਨਮ ਸੰਕਟ ਨਹੀ ਆਇਆ ॥੨॥
section: Aasaa - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

translation.text: He shall not have to suffer the pains of reincarnation into the world again. ||2||

transliteration.text: tau jag janam sankat nahī āiā .2.

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. This Raag gives the listener the determination and ambition to put aside any excuses and to proceed with the necessary action to achieve the aim. section: Aasaa - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

translation.text: Servant Ravi Daas is imbued with the Lord's Love.

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. text: ਇਉ ਗੁਰ ਪਰਸਾਦਿ ਨਰਕ ਨਹੀ ਜਾਤਾ ॥੩॥੫॥
section: Aasaa - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

translation.text: By Guru's Grace, he shall not have to go to hell. ||3||5||

transliteration.text: iu gur parasād narak nahī jātā .3.5.

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. text: ਮਾਟੀ ਕੋ ਪੁਤਰਾ ਕੈਸੇ ਨਚਤੁ ਹੈ ॥
section: Aasaa - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

translation.text: How does the puppet of clay dance?

transliteration.text: mātī kō putarā kaisē nachat hai .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. text: ਦੇਖੈ ਦੇਖੈ ਸੁਨੈ ਬੋਲੈ ਦਉਰਿਓ ਫਿਰਤੁ ਹੈ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
section: Aasaa - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

translation.text: He looks and listens, hears and speaks, and runs around. ||1||Pause||

transliteration.text: dēkhai dēkhai sunai bōlai dauriō phirat hai .1. rahāu .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. text: ਜਬ ਕਛੁ ਪਾਵੈ ਤਬ ਗਰਬੁ ਕਰਤੁ ਹੈ ॥
section: Aasaa - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

translation.text: When he acquires something, he is inflated with ego.

transliteration.text: jab kash pāvai tab garab karat hai .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. This Raag gives the listener the determination and ambition to put aside any excuses and to proceed with the necessary action to achieve the aim. text: ਮਾਇਆ ਗਈ ਤਬ ਰੋਵਨੁ ਲਗਤੁ ਹੈ ॥੧॥
section: Aasaa - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

translation.text: But when his wealth is gone, then he cries and bewails. ||1||

transliteration.text: māiā gaī tab rōvan lagat hai .1.

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. text: ਮਨ ਬਚ ਕ੍ਰਮ ਰਸ ਕਸਹਿ ਲੁਭਾਨਾ ॥
section: Aasaa - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

translation.text: In thought, word and deed, he is attached to the sweet and tangy flavors.

transliteration.text: man bach kram ras kasah lubhānā .

section: Aasaa - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

translation.text: When he dies, no one knows where he has gone. ||2||

section: Aasaa - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

translation.text: Says Ravi Daas, the world is just a dramatic play, O Siblings of Destiny.

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. text: ਬਾਜੀਗਰ ਸਉ ਮੋੁਹਿ ਪ੍ਰੀਤਿ ਬਨਿ ਆਈ ॥੩॥੬॥
section: Aasaa - Bhagtah Ki Bani (Teachings Of The Saints)

translation.text: I have enshrined love for the Lord, the star of the show. ||3||6||

transliteration.text: bājīgar sau mōh prīt ban āī .3.6.
